author: ET Bureau
title: Lockdown period won’t be counted in IBC timeline: IBBI
description: “...the period of lockdown imposed by the Central Government in the wake of COVID19 outbreak shall not be counted for the purposes of the time-line for any activity that could not be completed due to such lockdown, in relation to a corporate insolvency resolu…
content:
New Delhi: Lockdown period will not be counted towards the timeline for any activity under the corporate insolvency resolution process.
